product_name: Black Diamond Modernist Rock Jean Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: Equally capable of a night on the town and a day of climbing, the Black Diamond Modernist Rock Jeans combine the style of your favorite denim with the performance of stretch-woven soft shell. Schoeller(R) stretch-woven soft-shell fabric with NanoSphere(R) technology resists moisture, dirt and stains to keep your pants dry and looking good. Climbing-specific gusset allows excellent range of motion. Cuffs are designed so they can easily be rolled up when you're climbing. 2-way zippered fly is easy to access with a climbing harness on. 2 front hand pockets, 2 rear pockets plus a smartphone-friendly pocket.
short_description: Equally capable of a night on the town and a day of climbing, the Black Diamond Modernist Rock Jeans combine the style of your favorite denim with the performance of stretch-woven soft shell.
